meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Megan McLeod Kevin Bohannon James Holzhauer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7971.

td.p: Megan McLeod, a cinema manager from Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
Kevin Bohannon, a cell biologist from Ann Arbor, Michigan
James Holzhauer, a professional sports gambler from Las Vegas, Nevada (whose 7-day cash winnings total $415,035)

tr.td: THE FIRST WINNER
WORLD FULL OF IDIOMS
BIBLICAL PAINTINGS
NAME IN COMMON
INSIDE THE COUNTRY
(Alex: Each clue will contain a word that is found within the country that is the correct response.)
APRIL FOOLERY
